{"title":"Micrometer - Http Server Requests - Http Status Code","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index=metrics-*,q='name:http_server_requests AND status.keyword:2*',metric=sum:count).scale_interval(1s).lines(stack=true,width=0.2,fill=1.5).label('2XX').color(green).yaxis(label='Requests / sec',min=0),
.es(index=metrics-*,q='name:http_server_requests AND status.keyword:3*',metric=sum:count).scale_interval(1s).lines(stack=true,width=0.2,fill=1.2).label('3XX').color(blue),
.es(index=metrics-*,q='name:http_server_requests AND status.keyword:1*',metric=sum:count).scale_interval(1s).lines(stack=true,width=0.2,fill=1.5).label('1XX').color(yellow),
.es(index=metrics-*,q='name:http_server_requests AND status.keyword:4*',metric=sum:count).scale_interval(1s).lines(stack=true,width=0.2,fill=1.5).label('4XX').color(orange),
.es(index=metrics-*,q='name:http_server_requests AND status.keyword:5*',metric=sum:count).scale_interval(1s).lines(stack=true,width=0.2,fill=1.5).label('5XX').color(red),","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}
